column1: Time|Name|DM|image|Description!!
11:00 AM|RWBY: New Dawn Awaits|Tony (rekontang#0827)|rwby.png|Set in a fictional world of RWBY
column2: one of the popular shows by Roosterteeth
column3: you as a player will explore the world of Remnant as a huntsman in training. As a huntsman in training you will start off as a student in Beacon academy
column4: one of the most prestigious learning facilities for a huntsman training to combat against the Creatures of Destruction called Grimm. The Creatures of Grimm are known to destroy many villages and killing countless of people only to be lured in by a strong feeling of negativity. Along your journey you will encounter familiar faces such as Professor Oobleck
column6: and of course Ozpin. Of course
column7: there will be familiar villains too such as Roman Torchwick
column10: and Cinder Fall. Do you have what it takes to save the land of Remnant and keep the peace of the land safe?  This One-shot will use a homebrew system made from scratch.!!

column1: 11:00 AM|Eleventh Hour|Kamal (afroCAN#2315)|40K.png|"It is the 41st Millennium. For more than a hundred centuries
column2: the Emperor has sat immobile on the Golden Throne of Earth. He is the master of mankind by the will of the gods
column3: and master of a million worlds by the might of his inexhaustible armies. He is a rotting carcass writhing invisibly with power from the Dark Age of Technology. He is the Carrion Lord of the Imperium for whom a thousand souls are sacrificed every day so that He may never truly die. Yet in His deathless state
column4: the Emperor continues His eternal vigilance. Mighty battlefleets cross the daemon-infested miasma of the Warp
column5: the only route between distant stars
column6: their way lit by the Astronomican
column7: the psychic manifestation of the Emperor's will. Vast armies engage in battle in His name on uncounted worlds
column9: they are barely enough to hold off the ever-present threat from aliens
column12: and worse. To be a man in such times is to be one amongst untold billions. It is to live in the cruellest and most bloody regime imaginable.”

column1: Only War is a military roleplaying game in which players take the roles of Imperial Guardsmen in the Warhammer 40
column2: 000 universe. Using a percentile dice system
column3: 4-6 players will attempt to return to friendly lines before and orbital bombardment wipes their position from the face of the moon they have been fighting for the past few weeks..!!

column1: 11:00 AM|Scion Heroes|Vince (Adeylis#3647)|scion.png|It is the year 2050 for awhile not much have changed. However there have been reports of mysterious creatures and monsters appearing in various places. You the player are assumed to be like any other human beings. However throughout your life you appear to be better than the average human being. Weirdly enough you've been gift a random item with the sender claiming to be your parent. You grasp the item in hand
column2: with it you receive a surge of mystical power. You are now a scion
column3: a soon to be demigod of your parent god
column4: but just who is this mythical parent? That is what you will find out
column5: Journey the world and uncover its hidden secrets. Scion heroes is a mythological tabletop rpg. Where players play as an offspring of a god of the existing pantheons that we know of. They will have powers and potential to shape what they will become. This game runs similarly to exalted as a D10 success based system. In this system players roll a number of D10s to pass a threshold inorder determine whether they succeed in an action. However I'll be using a fan modified version of the original that will be more friendly to new players.!!

column1: 11:00 AM|Hyperlanes Gamma|Michael (Torchik#5226)|hyperlanes.png|The Year 3800
column2: has been a major success for space exploration
column4: and the advancement of technology. Your crew is a mercenary task force that has a good reputation within the Alliance
column5: you are stationed on the outer regions of explored space
column6: where Alliance control is slim. Because of this
column7: bandits are far more common than usual
column8: some are former Alliance ships that have defected
column9: others may have been formed by a third party. How will you and your crew face this unknown territory brimming with danger all around?

column1: Hyperlanes is a modified DnD 5e setting designed bring players into the stars. With that said
column2: Hyperlanes will use a standard D20 check system. Hyperlanes is just as approachable as DnD so newcomers and veterans alike will have no problem getting familiar with it.!!

column1: 11:00 AM|World Without Light|George (VirtualTitan#3867)|light.png|Imagine a world where light is a rarity
column2: where utter and complete darkness reigns supreme
column3: and where mankind is in a constant fight for its life against the ever encroaching shadows. Players will take on the role of elite adventurers who were hired to find and deal with a strange monster that has been driving people insane while creating horrifying abominations. World Without Light is a custom system primarily based on the Warhammer d100 systems. Players will have to be careful as physical injury is not the only way their character can fall in combat. Insanity is a common affliction in this world and the darkness that surrounds them has a strange way of corrupting those who venture into it without a source of light. All players are welcome
column4: but be warned that while fun is guaranteed
column5: victory and survival are not. There is space for 4-6!!

column1: 2:20 PM|DnD 5E|Cody (scullyer#7486)|dnd.png|A RPG set in a fantasy setting with magic and swords. Mainly focused on combat and dungeon crawl. the campain will be a group of adventurers clearing a cave system in the hopes for weath and fame.!!
2:20 PM|MAAAAAAAGICAL U|George (VirtualTitan#3867)|magic.png|Welcome one and all to Prim University
column2: a school where witches
column5: and weirdos go to train their magical abilities and become true magical masters. However something not quite magical has found it's way into Prim's pristine and glamorous hallways. A NORMAN (Person who has no magical powers) has infiltrated the school and begun attending lessons! Are they a spy? An investigator? A saboteur? Or maybe they're just some unlucky loser who wound up here accidentally. Players (4-6) will take on the roles of students (and NORMAN) and attempt to figure out who exactly doesn't belong. This is a custom game made up entirely by George Fee. D10's will be the only die used and a lot of roleplaying is expected.!!

column1: 2:20 PM|Exalted: Inheritance|Sam (EldritchSage#2032)|exalted.png|In the world of creation lies the Exalts
column2: the champions of the gods are granted immense power. There are the Dragon-Blooded
column5: and the Solars whose history is stained with slander and blood. The Solars once ruled creation until they were betrayed by the Sidereals and Dragon-Blooded. This was many years ago in the Golden Age. Now in the Bronze Age
column6: the Dragon-Blooded rule and have convinced most people that Solars are mere daemons taking the form of the person whom they have killed. This brought rise to the Wild Hunt
column7: a group of elite Dragon-Blooded who hunt Solars across the world.To ensure that a solar's spirit would not seek vengeance they are buried in lavish tombs full of treasures
column9: and dangerous traps and now after weeks of dangerous travel you find yourself mere moments away from the tomb of the legendary artificer
column10: The Ingenuity of Forsaken Wisdom. Exalted is a High Fantasy Cinematic RPG system. You play as a Solar one of the chosen exalts of the Unconquered Sun
column11: an already exception person granted more power to use as you see fit. This is a D10 system that measures numbers of successes in order to determine how well you handled the task. The game has a more abstract combat system with initiative being the edge you hold over your opponent not just when you act as well as a stunting system which grants the player bonuses for better and more creative descriptions for their actions.(edited)!!

column1: 2:20 PM|Magical Fury|Justin (Justin M#4912)||You and your friends seem like normal girls
column2: spending your days attending Venice High School. But you all have a secret; by night you activate your Family Relics to become the Starlight Enforcers! But
column3: rather than fighting evil by moonlight
column4: you ARE the evil... in a way. You act as the enforcers to the Starshine family
column5: the most revered Crime Family of the Astral Plane. And tonight is just another job as you make sure no other magical beings encroach on your turf.

column1: Magical Fury is a magical girl themed tabletop game
column2: with a focus on investigation and combat. The game mechanics are simple
column3: requiring only two six sided dice.!!

column1: 2:20 PM|A Past That Could Have Been|Chelsea (SolarEclipse#7789)|BlackVoid.png|“In the days when Babylon was the greatest city on Earth
column2: mankind lived in placid ignorance of the grandeur
column4: and horror of the Cosmos... though such tranquility does not often last. A series of deafening rumbles shook the Earth and black mist began to fill the heavens. Mankind stared in horrified awe as the sky itself seemed to rip apart
column5: revealing massive shadowy figures and incomprehensible darkness. As Earth was torn asunder
column6: the truth of existence was revealed. Ripped from their home and scattered across the Cosmos
column7: humanity was forced into a new struggle for survival in a far more cruel and chaotic world…” Generations later
column8: you are the descendants of those few humans that managed to survive. Whether by luck or skill
column9: you find yourself in the city Llyhn the Eternal– working to raise humanity to its rightful place among the stars.  You will play as members of the Assembly
column10: a section of the Faerdani Enclave that works to foster diplomatic relationships with various emissaries in Llyhn. You have been selected to assist a Bai’Waikh expeditionary mission on a recently discovered world believed to have been home to an older branch of their civilization.

column1: Mechanics:
Black Void is a high-horror
column2: low-fantasy role playing game with Eldritch horror and ancient Middle Eastern themes. The system uses a D12 DC Check system and manoeuver-based combat. It is freeform and suited well to both intrigue and combat focused campaigns where every choice has its benefits as well as its drawbacks.

column1: Warning: While this system does contain serious topics and graphic scenes (mostly concerning slavery
column2: semi-graphic violence
column4: this one-shot will be more good-natured.!!
